Songs of Scotland
Jolly Hatters Grounds, Denton, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £9, 3rd £6, 4th £3. March contest - 1st Kingston Mills, 2nd Glossop Old. Best soprano - F.Forbes, best horn - E.Fielding, best euphonium - J.Jennings, best baritone W.Duckworth (all Kingston Mills. Best trombone - J.Locker (Denton). Challenge contest between 4 local bands.
July 5, 2018, 7:41 a.m. July 5, 2018, 7:48 a.m.

2 Denton Original Alexander Owen
3 Glossop Old Band Alexander Owen
4 Hyde Borough Unknown
